short_summary: Sifting through contract details for competitive bid. It entails evaluating emissions via specific GHG estimation tools.
description: Government [funding project] GRANTS to specifically support Rail projects.
tags: Trade agreement with the World Trade Organization.
full_summary:
### Strategic Innovation Fund (SIF) Project-Level Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Estimation Consultancy

This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks to engage a consultant to support the validation of the Greenhouse Gas Estimation Tool. The consultant will review completed GHG Estimation Tools and assess their completeness, accuracy, and plausibility of estimates and assumptions used. If necessary, the consultant will provide technical support to applicants to ensure their estimates are reasonable and data are provided according to the guidance and specification of the GHG Estimation Tool.

[**Document Links**]
The RFP and supporting documents are available on [Canada Buy and Sell (Canadabuys.canada.ca)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/bde72cf5b30583795a03e5be5b6973d1/rfp_ised-204337_-_en.pdf). The following attachments contain additional information:
* Amendment 1 to Request for Proposal _ISED-204337_ (Aug. 17, 2022)
* Questions and Answers Document (Aug. 25, 2022)
* Amendment 2 to Request for Proposal _ISED-204337_ (Sep. 12, 2022)
* Questions and Answers Document (Sep. 9, 2022)
* Amendment 4 to Request for Proposal _ISED-204337_ (Oct. 6, 2022)
* Questions and Answers Document (Oct. 7, 2022)

[**Provisional Schedule**]
* Tender Closing Date: October 12, 2022, at 23:59 (EDT)
* Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
* Expected Contract End Date: To be determined

[**Proposal Requirements**]
* The consultant will receive completed GHG Estimation Tools and review them for completeness, accuracy, and plausibility of estimates and assumptions.
* The consultant may engage directly with applicants to provide technical support and answer questions.

## Important Links

* Request for Proposal _ISED-204337_ in English ([PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/bde72cf5b30583795a03e5be5b6973d1/rfp_ised-204337_-_en.pdf))
* Request for Proposal _ISED-204337_ in French ([PDF](https://canadabuys.canada
